job.title: Data Scientist

We are offering generous work-from-home benefits to improve our associateâs ability to work remotely.âI can succeed as a Data Scientist at Capital Group.âYou will lead small to medium projects which leverage data science techniques to mine and interpret data to solve strategic, tactical, structured, and unstructured business problems that are posed to them. You will be responsible to interpret and communicate analytic results to analytical and non-analytical business partners and senior managers.âI am the person Capital Group is looking for.â Â· You will build the capability to study and analyze structured and unstructured data, data from multiple internal and external sources to enable pattern seeking and analysis Â· You are proficient at translating unstructured business problems into math framework Â· Expertise in predictive analytics/statistical modeling/data mining algorithms Â· You are well versed in at least one statistical analysis tool Â· You have knowledge of distributed databases and have experience with SQL or related query languages Â· You have Computer Science concentration or joint major at Bachelorâs or Masterâs degree level. Â· You have demonstrated agility in providing value gained through data science to a large organization and or complex datasets. Â· You have an ability to provide data analysis and visualization solutions using cutting edge tools, algorithms, frameworks and languages like Python, R, Tensorflow/PyTorch, Plotly Dash, Streamlit, R Shiny or Tableau.âI can apply in less than 4 minutes.âYouâve reviewed this job posting and youâre ready to start the candidate journey with us.
